items.title: Caterpillar Inc. (CAT) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
items.description: Caterpillar (CAT) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.
